body: Alignment Shield (Alignment), Burning Flash (Fire), Dash (Time), Decipher* (Language), Fade (Concealing), Fog Bank (Weather), Force Block* (Armor), Force Shield (Armor), Fortify (Body), Friendship (Command), Glide (Flight), Lock Ward (Binding), Radiance (Illumination), Servitor I (Summoning), Shock Arc (Electricity), Simple Order (Command), Spook (Fear), Wrack (Pain)
